languages.text: {n}Бросив взгляды друг на друга, Паскаль и Оптикон-22 обмениваются краткой серией двоичных сигналов, после чего удовлетворенно склоняют головы. Капюшон вашего собеседника склоняется заметно ниже.{/n}
{n}Pasqal and Opticon-22 exchange glances and a short series of binharic signals before bowing their heads in satisfaction. Opticon-22's head bows noticeably lower than Pasqal's.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Бросив взгляды друг на друга, Паскаль и Оптикон-22 обмениваются краткой серией двоичных сигналов, после чего удовлетворенно склоняют головы. Капюшон вашего собеседника склоняется заметно ниже.{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルとオプティコン-22は視線を交わし、二進数信号を何度か送受信した後に満足げに頭を下げた。オプティコン-22の頭は、パスカルよりも明らかに低く下げられている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal and Opticon-22 exchange glances and a short series of binharic signals before bowing their heads in satisfaction. Opticon-22's head bows noticeably lower than Pasqal's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルとオプティコン-22は視線を交わし、二進数信号を何度か送受信した後に満足げに頭を下げた。オプティコン-22の頭は、パスカルよりも明らかに低く下げられている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡和奥普蒂孔22号交换了一下眼神，然后共同发出了一系列简短的二进制信号，满意地低下了头。奥普蒂孔22号的头明显比帕斯卡更低。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal and Opticon-22 exchange glances and a short series of binharic signals before bowing their heads in satisfaction. Opticon-22's head bows noticeably lower than Pasqal's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡和奥普蒂孔22号交换了一下眼神，然后共同发出了一系列简短的二进制信号，满意地低下了头。奥普蒂孔22号的头明显比帕斯卡更低。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal y Opticon-22 intercambian miradas y una breve serie de señales binarias antes de inclinar la cabeza en señal de satisfacción. La cabeza de Opticon-22 se hunde notablemente más que la de Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal and Opticon-22 exchange glances and a short series of binharic signals before bowing their heads in satisfaction. Opticon-22's head bows noticeably lower than Pasqal's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal y Opticon-22 intercambian miradas y una breve serie de señales binarias antes de inclinar la cabeza en señal de satisfacción. La cabeza de Opticon-22 se hunde notablemente más que la de Pasqal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal et Opticon-22 échangent des regards et une brève série de signaux binhaires, avant d'incliner chacun la tête en signe de satisfaction. Opticon-22 baisse la sienne bien plus bas que celle de Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal and Opticon-22 exchange glances and a short series of binharic signals before bowing their heads in satisfaction. Opticon-22's head bows noticeably lower than Pasqal's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal et Opticon-22 échangent des regards et une brève série de signaux binhaires, avant d'incliner chacun la tête en signe de satisfaction. Opticon-22 baisse la sienne bien plus bas que celle de Pasqal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal und Opticon-22 tauschen Blicke und eine kurze Reihe binhärischer Signale aus, bevor sie zufrieden den Kopf senken. Der von Opticon-22 beugt sich dabei deutlich tiefer als der von Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal and Opticon-22 exchange glances and a short series of binharic signals before bowing their heads in satisfaction. Opticon-22's head bows noticeably lower than Pasqal's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal und Opticon-22 tauschen Blicke und eine kurze Reihe binhärischer Signale aus, bevor sie zufrieden den Kopf senken. Der von Opticon-22 beugt sich dabei deutlich tiefer als der von Pasqal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal ve Opticon-22, birbirilerine bakıp kısa bir ikilidil sinyal akışı gerçekleştiriyorlar. Ardından da başlarını memnuniyetle eğiyorlar. Opticon-22'nin başı, Pasqal'ınkinden fark edilir ölçüde daha aşağıya eğiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal and Opticon-22 exchange glances and a short series of binharic signals before bowing their heads in satisfaction. Opticon-22's head bows noticeably lower than Pasqal's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal ve Opticon-22 başlarını memnuniyetle eğmeden önce ikilidilli bir sinyal akışıyla birbirlerine bakıyor. Opticon-22'nin başı, Pasqal'ınkinden daha aşağıya eğiliyor.{/n}
